template.value: <!doctype html> <html> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Hello World</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css"> <!--styles:css--> <!--endinject--> <!--vendor:js--> <!--endinject--> </head> <body> $END$ <script src="app.js"></script> <!--app:js--> <!--endinject--> </body> </html>
